data.question: What is the formula of the compound synthesized from L-methionine methyl ester hydrochloride?
What is the maximum gold uptake capacity of compound 1 when suspended in a 0.02 M AuCl3 H2O/CH3OH solution?
data.answer: 3 mmol of Au(III) per mmol of MOF

data.question: Is the crystal structure of AuI@1 preserved after gold capture compared to the original material?
What technique was used to determine the crystal structures of 1, AuIII@1, and AuI@1?
What is the role of thioether 'arms' in the selective capture of gold ions?
data.answer: The thioether 'arms' coordinate the desired metal assuming the favorite conformation.

data.question: Does the compound 1 exhibit selectivity for AuCl3 over other metal salts in the recovery process?
What is the estimated empty volume decrease in AuIII@1 compared to the original material 1?
data.answer: The estimated empty volumes decrease in AuIII@1 compared to 1.

data.question: What method was used to evaluate the selectivity of 1 towards AuCl3 and AuCl?
Can the starting material 1 be completely reusable after the gold extraction process?
What is the impact of aurophilic interactions in the structure of AuI@1?
data.answer: Aurophilic interactions contribute to the connectivity of gold(I) ions within the pores.

data.question: What is the space group of the crystal structure for compound 1?
Does the presence of gold ions in AuI@1 and AuIII@1 affect the flexibility of the ethylenethiomethyl arms?
What is the role of chlorine bridges in the coordination of Au3+ ions in AuIII@1?
data.answer: Chlorine bridges contribute to capturing Au3+ in its second sphere of coordination.

data.question: What is the chemical process used to synthesize (Me4N)2{Cu2[(S,S)-methox](OH)2} . 4H2O?
data.answer: The process involves treating H2Me2-(S,S)-methox with Me4NOH and CuCl2 in water.

data.question: Is the virtual diameter of the channels in AuIII@1 larger than in AuI@1?
What analytical technique confirmed the purity and homogeneity of the bulk samples of 1, AuIII@1, and AuI@1?
What is the significance of the aurophilic interactions observed in AuI@1?
data.answer: Aurophilic interactions indicate the presence of gold-gold interactions within the structure.

data.question: Does the compound 1 show high selectivity for gold(I) capture over other metal salts?
What is the role of the methionine-decorated channels in the MOF structure?
data.answer: The methionine-decorated channels are responsible for the selective capture of gold ions.
